Description: Who will lead the way to Nidah?
LevelDescriptionText: $Isle of Cats -> アイル・オブ・キャッツ, Isery -> イザリー$1|You have yet to recruit someone~5|Isery~3|Seek Isery, on the Isle of Cats
ChangeDescriptionText: $Isle of Cats -> アイル・オブ・キャッツ, Isery -> イザリー$1|The Seven require a guide.~5|The Seven have found their guide.~3|Isery, who dwells on the Isle of Cats, may replace Lorenzo.
Name: $Ambition -> 大望$Ambition: the Guide
